<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Ghostly Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1544)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 333 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=686), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=471), [Gravelady's Guard](/Deities.aspx?ID=247), [Minderhal](/Deities.aspx?ID=494), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290), [The Pale Horse](/Deities.aspx?ID=545), [Zjar-Tovan](/Deities.aspx?ID=360)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 weapon that is either unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target weapon becomes translucent and ghostly, and it can affect material and [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures and objects. It gains the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune, meaning it is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) if it wasn't already, is especially effective against incorporeal creatures, and can be wielded by a corporeal or incorporeal creature.
name: Ghostly Weapon
